description:
My place is close to Times Square, the Javits Center, and Hammerstein Ballroom. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, the building, and the amenities. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

I use a concierge service that will be available 24/7 for any questions or concerns that you may have during your stay! Just message through Airbnb, and they'll get back to you promptly.

Bursting with energy and devilish charisma, Hell’s Kitchen continues to evolve as high-rises move in and crooked characters move out. This classic New York City neighborhood is near it all—theaters on Broadway, green lawns in Central Park, and revered mom-and-pop culinary mainstays. As a storied NYC haunt, Hell’s Kitchen lives up to its unmistakable mystique.

Very close proximity to Port Authority Bus Terminal, Lincoln Tunnel, Penn Station.

Train Service nearby includes: 7, ACE, 123, & NQR
name: Luxury NYC 1 Bed w/Gorgeous Views + Pool
review: Beautiful view. Comfortable bed. Many channels on the tv. Very luxurious
